title: TV Watch Icon -> Available in Bottom Navigation Bar (Not currently being used)
custom_preconds: MAST tool has enabled the watch page/tv icon
custom_steps:
Given the user launches the app
When the MAST config tool enables the Watch page in the first 5 menu items
custom_expected:
THEN the Watch page appears for the user in the bottom tab bar
And the Watch Page icon appears in the upper left hand corner of the page

title: TV Watch Icon -> Available in Bottom Navigation Bar and is an Actionable
custom_preconds:
* MAST tool has enabled the watch page/tv icon
* TV icon is located in the bottom nav bar as well as the upper lefthand corner
custom_steps: When the user taps the Watch (TV) icon at the nav bar
custom_expected: Then the user is brought to the MLB TV page

title: TV Watch Icon -> Available in Upper Left Hand Corner of Page and is Actionable (Not Currently in Use)
custom_preconds:
* MAST tool has enabled the watch page/tv icon
* TV icon is located in the bottom nav bar as well as the upper lefthand corner
custom_steps: When the user taps the Watch (TV) icon at the upper lefthand side of the page
custom_expected: Then the user is brought to the MLB TV page

title: Move Audio Icon -> Unauthenticated User
custom_preconds:
* User has app downloaded 
* User is not logged into the app
custom_steps: When the user taps on the Hamburger menu on the top right nav
custom_expected: THEN the user will see an Audio icon located in "Quick Hits" Sections

title: Move Audio Icon -> Unauthenticated User-> User Clicks Audio Icon
custom_preconds:
* User has app installed
* User is not logged into the app.
custom_steps:
GIVEN the user is on the Browse menu
WHEN the user taps the Audio item in Sections
custom_expected: THEN the user will be gated by the MLB Audio paywall

title: Move Audio Icon -> Authenticated User
custom_preconds:
* User has app downloaded 
* User is logged in with an entitled account.
custom_steps:
When the user is on Home 
AND the user taps on the Hamburger menu on the top right nav
custom_expected: THEN the user should see Audio under Sections

title: Move Audio Icon -> Authenticated User-> User Clicks Audio Icon
custom_preconds:
* User has app downloaded
* User is logged in with and entitled account
custom_steps:
GIVEN the user is on the Browse menu
WHEN the user taps on the Audio icon
custom_expected: THEN the user will land on the audio date picker/calendar

title: Move Audio Icon -> Set Feature Flag to "True"
custom_steps:
Given the user navigates to the homepage
When the feature flag is set to true in charles
custom_expected: Then the user should see the audio icon in the top nav

title: TV Watch Icon -> Set Feature Flag to "True" (Not currently being used)
custom_steps:
Given the user navigates to the homepage
When the feature flag is set to true in Charles
custom_expected: Then the user should see the Watch icon in the top nav

title: Default Tabs After Onboarding in Airplane Mode
custom_preconds:
* Ensure user completes a fresh install of the application 
* Turn on airplane mode (no wifi)
custom_steps:
Given the user opens the app
When the user moves through the on boarding process
custom_expected: Then the user should expect to see the typical navigation bar

title: Home Surface -> User Clicks Home Item in Tab Bar -> User Remains Where They Were When Scrolled
custom_preconds: * User is scrolling through content on the home surface
custom_steps:
Given user is not at the top of the feed 
When the user clicks the home item in the tab bar
custom_expected: Then user will remain where they were when scrolled.

title: Home -> User Clicks Home Item in Tab Bar-> User Will Remain Where They Were When Scrolled
custom_preconds: * User is scrolling through content on the Home tab
custom_steps:
Given user is not at the top of the feed
When the user clicks on another item in the tab bar (separate page)
and the user lands on the desired page
When the user clicks back on the Home tab, the user's scroll position should be maintained
and the user clicks the home item in the tab bar
custom_expected: Then the user will remain where they were when scrolled.

title: Scores -> User Clicks Scores Tab Bar-> User Will Remain Where They Scrolled
custom_preconds: * User is scrolling through content on the Scores tab
custom_steps:
Given user is not at the top of the feed
When the user clicks on another item in the tab bar (separate page)
and the user lands on the desired page
When the user clicks back on the Scores tab, the user's scroll position should be maintained
and the user clicks the scores item in the tab bar
custom_expected: Then the user will remain where they scrolled.

title: News -> User Clicks News Item in Tab Bar -> User brought to Top of Page
custom_preconds: * User is scrolling through content on the News Tab
custom_steps:
Given user is not at the top of the feed 
When the user clicks the News item in the tab bar
custom_expected: Then the user will be scrolled to the top of the feed

title: Watch -> User Clicks Watch in Tab Bar -> User Brought to the top of the Page
custom_preconds: * User is scrolling through content on the Watch Tab
custom_steps:
Given user is not at the top of the feed 
When the user clicks the Watch item in the tab bar
custom_expected: Then the user will be scrolled to the top of the feed

title: Simplified Navigation Coach Marks (Feature Flag On)
custom_preconds:
* User has latest test flight version
* Feature Flag is turned on
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user launches the app with the latest navigation changes feature flagged on

AND the user has not already seen and dismissed either of the coach marks before

WHEN the app loads
custom_expected: THEN a coach mark will appear on the bottom tab bar to educate the user in context on the changes there

title: Simplified Navigation Coach Marks (Feature Flag Off)
custom_preconds:
* User has latest test flight version
* Feature Flag is turned off
custom_steps: GIVEN a user launches the app with the latest navigation changes feature flagged off
custom_expected: Then the user will NOT see a coach mark will appear on the bottom tab bar

title: Simplified Navigation Coach Marks -> Open App -> Coach Mark ->  Don't Dismiss -> Close App -> Reopen App  (Feature Flag On)
custom_preconds:
* User has latest test flight version
* Feature Flag is turned on
* a coach mark has appeared on the bottom tab bar to educate the user in context on the changes there
custom_steps:
Given the user opens the app 
And does not dismiss the coach mark 
And the user closes the app and reopens
custom_expected: Then the user will continue to see the coach mark

title: Simplified Navigation Coach Marks -> Open App -> Coach Mark ->  Dismiss -> Close App -> Reopen App  (Feature Flag On)
custom_preconds:
* User has latest test flight version
* Feature Flag is turned on
* a coach mark has appeared on the bottom tab bar to educate the user in context on the changes there
custom_steps:
Given the user opens the app 
And dismisses the coach mark 
And the user closes the app and reopens
custom_expected: Then the user will no longer see the coach mark

title: Simplified Navigation Coach Marks-> More Menu (Feature Flag On)
custom_preconds:
* User has latest test flight version
* Feature Flag is turned on
* a coach mark has appeared on the bottom tab bar to educate the user in context on the changes there
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the more menu
custom_expected: Then in the more menu, once launched by the user, the user is educated on the context of the coach mark changes

title: Watch Tab -> Search Present on Watch Tab Navigation Bar
custom_preconds: * User has latest build installed
custom_steps:
Given the user opens the app
When the user navigates to the Watch Tab
custom_expected: Then the user will see "Search" present on the top navigation bar

title: Watch Tab -> Search Clickable and Renders in a Web View
custom_preconds:
* User has latest build installed
* User has navigated to Watch Tab
custom_steps:
Given the user has navigated to the watch tab and sees the Search option on the top navigation bar
When the user clicks the Search option
custom_expected: Then the user is brought to a web view page of Search

title: Voice Over Accessibility -> Watch Tab -> Search Present on Watch Tab Navigation Bar
custom_preconds:
* User has latest build installed
* User has voice over accessibility turned on from phone settings
custom_steps:
Given the user opens the app
When the user navigates to the Watch Tab
custom_expected:
Then the user will see "Search" present on the top navigation bar
And when the user one clicks "Search" the voice over accessibility will be called out to the user

title: Move Cast Icon From Top Left to Top Right
custom_preconds: * User has latest build installed on device
custom_steps:
GIVEN a user launches the MLB App

WHEN they look in top right hand corner of the nav bar
custom_expected: THEN they will see and be able to cast video content to their google cast device when they tap on it

title: MLB Network Tab -> Moved Inside Watch Tab
custom_preconds: * User has latest build installed
custom_steps:
Given the user opens the app and lands on the homepage
When the user clicks the "Watch" Tab Icon
custom_expected: Then the user will see a clickable "MLB Network" CTA button

title: MLB Network Tab -> Moved Inside Watch Tab
custom_preconds: * User has latest build installed
custom_steps:
Given the user opens the app and lands on the homepage
When the user clicks the "Watch" Tab Icon
custom_expected: Then the user will see a clickable "MLB Network" CTA button

title: MLB Network Tab -> Moved Inside Watch Tab -> Watch Tab is Clickable
custom_preconds: * User has latest build installed
custom_steps:
Given the user opens the app and lands on the homepage
When the user clicks the "Watch" Tab Icon
And the user will see a clickable "MLB Network" CTA button
And the user clicks the MLB Network CTA
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to that page and the page will render properly

title: Home Tab -> Stays Present -> Restarting App
custom_preconds: * User upgrades app from previous build
custom_steps:
Given the user starts the app
And the home tab is displayed
When the user restarts the app
custom_expected: Then the home tab is still displayed

title: Home Tab -> Stays Present -> Restarting App
custom_preconds: * User upgrades app from previous build
custom_steps:
Given the user starts the app
And the home tab is displayed
When the user restarts the app
custom_expected: Then the home tab is still displayed

title: App Navigation for Feature Flag Watch Tab
custom_preconds: * Ensure feature flag for watch tab is turned on in either the QA Env or by way of special build
custom_steps:
Given the watch tab in the upper left hand corner of the home screen
And the user taps the watch tab
custom_expected:
Then the user will be taken to section of the app
And a "back" or "done" button will be present in the upper left hand side of the screen

title: Update Top Nav Icons-> MLB Logo To Top Nav
custom_preconds: * User has app downloaded
custom_steps:
GIVEN I am on the Home Surface, Standings, Scores or Watch tabs. NOT News

WHEN I look at the center of the top nav bar
custom_expected: THEN I will see the MLB Logo
